summary: Mod add a new man-follower. He is a Orc-warrior.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Non-kids dialogues (18+)[/size][/b]

[b][i][size=5][center][color=#cc0000]"What could be scarier than an Orc with an Axe?"[/color][/center][/size][/i][/b][b][size=4]Drog Gro-Dan[/size][/b][size=3] - Orc warrior. And that's it. It is simple and straightforward. honest and tough, wise and strong. Despises the corruption of the soul. And betrayal. His way to Malacath. It is the path of the Warrior.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Yeah, he's a powerful tank, but not a stupid mashine. He has his own character, his views on the world. [/size][size=3]He rushes into battle with his axe and carries all apart!
He is one in the entire universe of the game.[/size][size=3]
[/size][b][u][size=5]Description:[/size][/u][/b][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b][color=#cc0000]Armor class:[/color] [/b]any[/size][size=3][b][color=#cc0000]Race: [/color][/b]Orc[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b][color=#cc0000]Age:[/color][/b] 39 years[/size][color=#cc0000][size=3][b]Is not able to marry, like all Orcs[/b][/size][/color][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b][color=#cc0000]Weapon class:[/color][/b] any.[/size][size=3]Owns his Axe, which has not parted.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][b][color=#cc0000]Level: [/color][/b]only 240, warrior and experienced battle-hardened.

[/size][size=3][youtube]FItqpxMkHjU[/youtube]
[/size][b][u][size=5]Location:[/size][/u][/b][size=3] The "Dragon Reach" [/size]Whiterun[size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][b][u][size=5]Features:[/size][/u][/b][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Able to breathe under water.
[/size][size=3]Wearing his Amulet of protection from magic.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]He stay in the location.where he was left[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Have in the backpack a piece of paper with the spell teleport Drog anywhere in the world to the player.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Have a dual-welding. But the best axe he has not to select puts the fights with Axe.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Have few dialogues. In Russian voice by me. the text was translated to English in subtitles.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Brave, loves the battle of the manic. At the same time, he is wise and judicious. While out of combat.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][b][u][size=5][/size][/u][/b][center][b][u][size=5]From myself:[/size][/u][/b][size=3]
[/size][size=3]I did not create another "body with a stick"[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]I did not pose as a professional and create a cool NPC.[/size][size=3]I have created a simple and clear Orc Warrior. And that's all. and nothing more. [/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]This particular person! Keep that in mind[/size][/center][size=3][/size]
author: Nibiros13
